'Wilhelm Friedrich Benedikt Hofmeister' (18 May 1824 – 12 January 1877)
was a German biologist and botanist. He "stands as one of the true giants in the
history of biology and belongs in the same pantheon as Darwin and Mendel." He was largely self-taught.
categories: Members of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences
